title: mAdhava mAmava
sahitya:
mAdhava mAmava mandara nagadhara marakata maNinibha surucira sundara


anupallavi

  kOdhana paripAlana shIla uragOdhara shayanAravinda mayana


caraNam    nAda madu vinOda madhusUdana vAdita muraLI mrdu sangIta 
yAdava kula pAvana kAraNa mamAdhAra bhavapriyA sahOdara
